title: Hold Fast: A Hollywood Pirate's Tale
description: HOLD FAST is the long awaited autobiography of Mark Ryan – star of film, TV and stage, including Robin of Sherwood, Evita, Transformers, and most recently, the series Black Sails. Mark’s book, written in collaboration with long time friend John Matthews, tells the story of an extraordinary life, ranging from his appearances in some of the major TV shows and films of the 20th and 21st centuries, while at the same time he continued a secret existence as an operative of British Military Intelligence. Mark’s dual life, as actor and soldier, later flowed into work as a licensed Private Eye in the USA, and to working with members of Hollywood’s elite, helping them deal with a variety of issues.If you think you know about Mark Ryan, be prepared for surprises! Told with characteristic wit and honesty, Hold Fast is set to become the must-read story of a remarkable man.
author: Mark      Ryan
